resources.string: You have an older version of the app.\nKindly update to get the latest version for best experience.

Dialup gives you easy access to your favourite USSD codes and emergency numbers. No need to memorize codes for banks, network service, TV subscription, or Police help lines.\n\nSimply click on the code you want to dial.

Dialup gives you easy access to your favourite USSD codes and emergency numbers. \n\nThe app contains the short codes for banks, network service, TV subscription, health services, etc. Also, the app has emergency phone numbers you can quickly dial whenever the need arises. This includes Police Help lines, Rape Complaint Numbers, Quick Response Squad, etc.

Developed with ❤️ by Mendhie (@Megamendhie) 

Codes curated by Mendhie and Jaachimma 

Logo designed by Nsikak Owo 

Illustrations from Pablo, Rawpixel, and Thierry
